inclusion.criterion: enrolled on Protocol 2009-0528, and/or one parent or adult non-parent primary caretaker of the child enrolled on Protocol 2009-0528
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients greater than or equal to 1 year
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients not enrolled on Protocol 2009-0528 will be excluded from this study
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: The patient is a known case of Acromegaly who underwent transsphenoidal surgery 4 months ago. He came to the clinic for follow up lab studies after his primary resection surgery.
